column1: London boroughs' median income and deprivation ranking relative to London and rest of England (2019)

column5: Deprivation index relative to rest of England

column1: Note: This indicator compares (as a ratio) the median income deprivation rank of the neighbourhoods in each London borough to both the England median and the London median respectively. A ratio greater than 1 indicates more deprivation relative to the comparison.
Data source: English Indices of Deprivation, Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government
London's Poverty Profile is created by charitable funder, Trust for London, and economic and public policy consultancy, WPI Economics
